problems.title: Count Subsequence Matches
problems.description:
Given two strings S and T, count how many distinct subsequences of S are equal to T, using recursion.

Input Format:
Two lines: S and T.

Output Format:
Print the count of distinct subsequences of S equal to T.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
banana
ban

Sample Output
3
hintsList: If s[i]==t[j], you can either use this character or skip it: count(i+1,j+1)+count(i+1,j). If j==len(t) return 1; if i==len(s) return 0.
